_source.text: 5. (U) Jahaker inquired about the possibility of USAID-funded assistance in Wasit, stating that because of the province's proximity to Baghdad and geographic size, the humanitarian situation there was worse than in other South Central Provinces.

text: **because** of the province's proximity to Baghdad and geographic **size**, the humanitarian situation there was **worse** **than** in other **South** Central Provinces.
